00061         Log *logger = NULL;
00062         GraphicsEngine *graphicsEngine = NULL;
00063         InputManager *inputManager = NULL;
00064         Map *mapEngine = NULL;

00071     Game::Game(const std::string &path)
00072     {
00073         resourceManager = new ResourceManager(path);
00074         logger = new Log;
00075     }
00076 
00077         Game::~Game()
00078         {
00079             delete player;
00080             delete beingManager;
00081             delete resourceManager;
00082                 delete networkManager;
00083                 delete interfaceManager;
00084                 delete mapEngine;
00085                 delete inputManager;
00086                 delete graphicsEngine;
00087                 delete logger;
00088         }
00089 
00090         void Game::run()
00091         {
00092                 // load in configuration file
00093                 XMLFile file;
00094                 std::string hostname;
00095                 int port = 0;
00096                 int opengl = 0;
00097 
00098                 if (file.load("townslife.cfg"))
00099         {
00100             file.setElement("server");
00101             hostname = file.readString("server", "host");
00102             port = file.readInt("server", "port");
00103             file.setElement("graphics");
00104                         opengl = file.readInt("graphics", "opengl");
00105         }
00106 
00107                 // check whether opengl should be used
00108                 opengl ? graphicsEngine = new OpenGLGraphics : graphicsEngine = new SDLGraphics;
00109                 graphicsEngine->init();
00110                 inputManager = new InputManager;
00111                 mapEngine = new Map;
00112                 interfaceManager = new InterfaceManager;
00113                 networkManager = new NetworkManager;
00114                 beingManager = new BeingManager;
00115                 player = new Player;
00116 
00117                 if (hostname.empty() || port == 0)
00118                 {
00119                     logger->logWarning("Error loading configuration, using defaults");
00120                     networkManager->setDefault("localhost", 9910);
00121                 }
00122                 else
00123                 {
00124                     networkManager->setDefault(hostname, port);
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 // Create state to connect to server
00128                 mOldState = 0;
00129                 mState = new ConnectState();
00130                 mState->enter();
00131 
00132                 // Update the state each frame
00133                 // Render the frame
00134                 // Get Input
00135                 while (mState->update())
00136                 {
00137                         graphicsEngine->renderFrame();
00138                         inputManager->getEvents();
00139                         networkManager->process();
00140                         cleanUp();
00141                 }
00142         }
00143 
00144         void Game::changeState(GameState *state)
00145         {
00146         mState->exit();
00147         mOldState = mState;
00148         mState = state;
00149         mState->enter();
00150         }
00151 
00152         void Game::cleanUp()
00153         {
00154             if (mOldState && mOldState->noKeep())
00155         {
00156             delete mOldState;
00157             mOldState = NULL;
00158         }
00159         }
00160 
00161     void Game::disconnect()
00162     {
00163         networkManager->disconnect();
00164         networkManager->process();
00165         while (networkManager->isConnected() && mState->update())
00166         {
00167             graphicsEngine->renderFrame();
00168                         inputManager->getEvents();
00169                         networkManager->process();
00170         }
00171     }
00172 
00173     bool Game::connect(const std::string &server, int port)
00174     {
00175         networkManager->connect(server, port);
00176         networkManager->process();
00177         time_t timeout = time(NULL) + 10;
00178                 time_t curTime = time(NULL);
00179         while (!networkManager->isConnected() && mState->update())
00180         {
00181             if (curTime > timeout)
00182                 return false;
00183             graphicsEngine->renderFrame();
00184                         inputManager->getEvents();
00185                         networkManager->process();
00186             curTime = time(NULL);
00187         }
00188 
00189         return true;
00190     }
00191 }
